description.@en: A god-like ray of burning white energy strikes down at your foes.

data.distance: Any one place you can see

criticalFailure.@en: The pillar is made not of light, but of darkness. It immediately extinguishes all sources of light in an Explosion Template around you. In addition, it causes all those within it who have Chaos Ranks higher than their Order Ranks to immediately suffer 9 Corruption. The darkness then vanishes and natural light is restored.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the foes are left Defenseless for one Turn.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you cause a burning pillar of light to descend on the targeted location. All those who are caught within the Explosion Template who fail to Resist with an Awareness Test suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in physical Peril and cannot Counterspell, Dodge or Parry for one Turn.
